name: Doomer farm
description:
Doomer Farm - is an engaging farm simulator that immerses you in the world of doomer post-punk culture. You'll need to restore your doomer family farm by taking care of animals, growing sunflower seeds, and building factories, all while constantly avoiding the watchful eyes of health inspectors.


Five key features of the game:

  • Doomer Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in the unique ambiance of gloomy multi-story buildings and the post-punk style that creates a distinct mood for the game.
  • Farm Management: Tend to animals, grow sunflower seeds, and expand your farm to produce more valuable products.
  • Building and Upgrading: Construct and improve various factories to optimize production on the farm.
  • Avoiding Health Inspectors: Your task is to remain unnoticed by health inspectors to preserve your farm and continue its development.
  • Post-Punk and Alternative Culture: "Doomer Farm" draws inspiration from doomer aesthetics and the atmosphere of dark post-punk culture, giving the game a unique and distinctive style.
